law.text: All county clerks in the Commonwealth shall maintain a book or other similar record on a permanent basis containing the registrations and other information required to be filed under KRS 367.513. Said book shall be a public record.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 500, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 281, sec. 5, effective July 1, 1974. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 3.
